item.description:
Treat yourself to a Spa Nite at the Growing Green Wellness Center with Kristy Wunder, a trained a massage therapist and yoga teacher, who specializes in holisitc health & detoxification therapies.

ONGOING FRIDAYS 5:30-7pm

Try one of Kristy's detox treatments at these special prices:

$40 for two ½ hour packages
$30 for ½ hour package plus 20 min sauna session
Bring a friend and pay $25 each! (special code: friend)

Detox Package 1
Castor Oil Packs & Rejuvenating Foot Bath

Detox Package 2
Wet Cell Appliance & Detoxifying Back Scrub

Pamper Package
Rejuvenating Foot Bath & Detoxifying Back Scrub

Any of these treatments includes a warm neck wrap & relaxing herbal tea drink to soothe tense muscles naturally.

Treatment Descriptions:
Castor Oil Paks help to improve elimination, lymphatic circulation & draws infections out of body. Hydrotherapy Foot Baths will soothe & soak your tired feet, stimulate skin with a scrub that removes dead skin cells, and gentlly massage the feet. Back Scrubs use olive oil myr or dead sea salt to both improve circulation while easing tension and relaxing the body. A Wet Cell is a subtle energy device that stimulates all-body systems by transmitting the benefits of minerals. It can also be used as a pain killer.

Due to space limitations, Spa Night has spots for just four people.
item.name: Spa Nite: Purify your Body/Mind
